_header: Authentic books and stories old and new
_description: Bernardus de cura rei familiaris — 408 lines in couplets with interspersed Latin text

CULKk15.First Lines:
Awtentyk bukys and storis alde and newBe wys poetys ar tretit
                    þe quhilk trew…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…þat can notht lesse in lykyne þam alaneBe this
                    vertew na sampylle may be tane
CULKk15.Attributed Title:
Bernardus de cura rei familiaris (f. 2); Explicit tractatus
                        Bernardi de cura rei familiaris (f. 10v)
CULKk15.Editions:
Stevenson,  Joseph. 
             The Scottish Metrical Romance of Lancelot du Lak.
Maitland Club
         48. Edinburgh, 1839: 161-8.
Lumby,  Joseph Rawson,
                        ed.  
             Bernardus De Cura Rei Famuliaris, with some early Scottish
                Prophecies.
